cn.trinea.android.common.view

接口 BorderScrollView.OnBorderListener

  • 封闭类:
    BorderScrollView

    public static interface BorderScrollView.OnBorderListener
    OnBorderListener, Called when scroll to top or bottom
    作者:
    Trinea 2013-5-22

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onBottom()
      Called when scroll to bottom
      void onTop()
      Called when scroll to top
